title: DiRAC2: 100 Tflop/s HPC cluster procurement
abstractText: This award covers the capital cost of procuring a 100 Tflop/s HPC cluster to be hosted at University of Leicester as part of the DiRAC2 facility.
impactText:
The DiRAC facility is being widely used by researchers across the UK. We are working closely with industrial partners to design our future systems - this interaction is expected to lead to collaborative technical projects.

A significant fractino of our graduating PhD students have gone into many branches of industry, including aerospace, defence and the games industry.
